data.name: Fossilized Lightning
data.description: Can be recycled into crafting materials.

data.name: Free Loadout Augment
data.description: Basic augment for rookie Raiders, offering slightly more backpack space and carry capacity.

data.name: Frequency Modulation Box
data.description: Can be recycled into crafting materials

data.name: Fried Motherboard
data.description: Can be recycled into crafting materials.

guide_links.label: Where to Get Fried Motherboards in ARC Raiders

data.name: Fruit Mix
data.description: A food item that moderately increases both health and stamina.

data.name: Frying Pan
data.description: Can be recycled into crafting materials.

data.name: Garlic Press
data.description: It'll press garlic, olives, and probably many other things.

data.name: Gas Grenade
data.description: A grenade that emites lingering toxic cloud on impact, draining the stamina of any Raiders within its area of effect.

data.name: Gas Grenade Trap
data.description: A laser trip wire that detonates a Gas Grenade

data.name: Gas Mine
data.description: A proximity-triggered mine that pops up and deploys a gas cloud that rapidly drains stamina

data.name: Gas Mine Blueprint
data.description: Lets you craft a Gas Mine

data.name: Geiger Counter
data.description: Can be recycled into crafting materials.

data.name: Gentle Duck
data.description: Udderly adorable.
data.flavor_text: Can be thrown to create noise.

data.name: Goggles (Radio Renegade Variant)
data.description: Radio Renegade cosmetic variant - unlocked by completing A Warm Place to Rest quest.

data.name: Great Mullein
data.description: Used to craft medical supplies.

data.name: Green Light Stick
data.description: A throwable chemical light that illuminates the area around it.

data.name: Green Light Stick Blueprint
data.description: Lets you craft a Green Light Stick.

data.name: Hairpin I
data.description: Single-action pistol with a built-in silencer. Great for stealth, but tricky in combat.

data.name: Hairpin II
data.description: Single-action pistol with a built-in silencer. Great for stealth, but tricky in combat.

data.name: Hairpin III
data.description: Single-action pistol with a built-in silencer. Great for stealth, but tricky in combat.

data.name: Hairpin IV
data.description: Single-action pistol with a built-in silencer. Great for stealth, but tricky in combat.

data.name: Happy Jig (Emote)
data.description: Maintain at least a  Rookie II rank in trials until season end.

data.name: Headphones
data.description: Can be recycled into crafting materials.

data.name: Heavy Ammo
data.description: Heavy bullets used mainly with large-caliber weapons.

data.name: Heavy Fuze Grenade
data.description: A grenade that detonates after a delay, dealing explosive damage in its radius.

data.name: Heavy Gun Parts
data.description: Used directly in crafting items of all tiers.

data.name: Heavy Gun Parts Blueprint
data.description: Used directly in crafting items of all tiers.

data.name: Heavy Shield
data.description: A heavy shield that blocks a large portion of incoming damage, but carries a significant cost to mobility.

data.name: Helmet (Radio Renegade Variant)
data.description: Radio Renegade Helmet Variant - Unlocks by completing Flickering Threat Quest

data.name: Herbal Bandage
data.description: An improvised medical item that gradually restores health over time.

data.name: Horizontal Grip
data.description: Moderately reduces both vertical and horizontal recoil.
data.flavor_text: 30% Reduced Horizontal Recoil - 30% Reduced ADS Speed

data.name: Hornet Driver
data.description: A control module used to operate Hornet drones or vehicles.

data.name: Household Cleaner
data.description: Can be recycled into chemicals.
